title: ScholarChemQA: Unveiling the Power of Language Models in Chemical Research Question Answering
details: X Chen, T Wang, T Guo, K Guo, J Zhou, H Li, M Zhuge… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Question Answering (QA) effectively evaluates language models' reasoning and knowledge depth. While QA datasets are plentiful in areas like general domain and biomedicine, academic chemistry is less explored. Chemical QA plays a crucial role …
